2069330.name: Changer Seven
2069330.description:
A LOVE LETTER TO OUR CHILDHOOD HEROES, AND THE CHANGE THEY LEFT IN OUR HEARTS!

Dive into Changer Seven, an exhilarating 3D third-person action-adventure where fast-paced combat meets stunning visuals and a gripping narrative.

Lead a squad of super-powered teenagers in a tag-team/assist-based combat system to battle hordes of enemies and uncover the dark mysteries surrounding their legacy. As you fight to save humanity, you’ll also face the personal struggles that come with being a hero and the changes your choices can bring to the future.

BE THE CHANGE!

Play as your favorite Changer Seven, unleash radical combos, and call in allies to assist you in battle. Face a terrifying old menace transforming citizens into monstrous beings and defend the city of Sunny Point from total annihilation!

FEATURES

✅ REUNITE THE PARTY – Gather and control your favorite Changer Seven!
✅ TAG TEAM COMBAT – Call in allies for assist-based attacks!
✅ A VAST WORLD TO EXPLORE – Traverse cityscapes, underground hideouts, and mysterious dungeons beyond Sunny Point.
✅ EPIC CINEMATICS – Immerse yourself in a breathtaking story of courage and transformation!
✅ DYNAMIC COMBO SYSTEM – Chain attacks, switch characters, and master devastating skills!
✅ SPECIAL ABILITIES – Unlock powerful new abilities to crush your foes!
✅ BOSS BATTLES – Take down colossal enemies and reclaim lost territories!

ARE YOU READY TO EMBRACE THE CHANGE?
2069330.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
